What is (are) Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ?,"Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), also referred to as ""Lou Gehrig's disease,"" is a progressive motor neuron disease which leads to problems with muscle control and movement. There are various types of ALS, which are distinguished by their signs and symptoms and their cause. Early symptoms may include muscle twitc
